   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to My Tennis Club's Documentation
=========================================

This is the official documentation for the **My Tennis Club** project, a Django-based application for managing a tennis club, members, and their bookings.

Contents
---------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Documentation Overview

   usage
   api_reference
   tutorials/basic_usage
   guides/deployment
   guides/DjangoTags
   dev/setup
   modules

Getting Started
---------------

To get started with **My Tennis Club**, follow the instructions in the `tutorials/basic_usage` section, which will guide you through the installation and setup process.

.. note::
   You can also check out the [Django documentation](https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/stable/) for more details on setting up a Django project.

API Reference
-------------

For detailed information on the available API endpoints, head to the `api_reference` section. This includes descriptions of authentication, user management, and other available API endpoints.

Development Setup
-----------------

If you're planning to contribute to the project, refer to the `dev/setup` section for setting up your development environment. This section includes details on installing dependencies, running tests, and more.

Deployment Guide
----------------

For deployment to production, see the `guides/deployment` section, where you'll find instructions on how to deploy **My Tennis Club** using Gunicorn and Nginx, as well as configuration tips for your production environment.

Project Information
-------------------

The **My Tennis Club** project is maintained by **Your Name**. The project is licensed under the MIT License.

You can find the source code for this project on GitHub:

`https://github.com/yourusername/my_tennis_club`

Getting Help
------------

If you need help or have questions about the project, feel free to reach out to the maintainers or consult the documentation:

- [Project Issues Tracker](https://github.com/yourusername/my_tennis_club/issues)
- [Project Discussions](https://github.com/yourusername/my_tennis_club/discussions)

For additional information or troubleshooting tips, refer to the relevant sections in the documentation or consult the Django documentation.

Contributing
------------

We welcome contributions to the project! Please refer to the `dev/setup` section for instructions on setting up your local development environment and start contributing.

   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: More Information
